name: BT Block Puzzle - Brain Game
description:
BT Block Puzzle - Brain Game is a Tetris like block puzzle game. It’s a simple yet challenging free block puzzle you won’t be able to put down.

Play this brick-style cute block game to relax and train your brain. You can play BT Block Puzzle - Brain Game anytime, anywhere, and play the game without the internet. Easy to learn and fun to master the gameplay.

How to play BT Block Puzzle - Brain Game:
- Drag and drop blocks into 8x8 grid
- Fill the blocks with a row or column to eliminate them
- The game will be over if there is no room on the board for given blocks
- Blocks CAN'T be rotated
- Reward scores for each step and every row or column of blocks you eliminated

Get as many scores as you can to become block crush at BT Block Puzzle - Brain Game

Match blocks to remove them by completing lines and cubes. Keep the board clean and beat your high score in this block puzzle! Test your IQ and win the block puzzle game!

If you like unblock and block puzzle games, sliding puzzles, woody tricks, merge or block hexa puzzles, then BT Block Puzzle - Brain Game is the perfect option for you. Take a break from the daily grind and blockade bad thoughts by immersing yourself in this brain teaser. You definitely won't be bored playing block puzzle games! Relieve stress or train your brain with a relaxing yet challenging IQ game of BT Block Puzzle - Brain Game anywhere, anytime!
